title: relates to the insertion of Chapter 1A of the Principal Act, with reference to the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 

2022 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited personal injury resolution board act 2022 (commencement) order 2024

title: relates to the insertion of Chapter 1A of the Principal Act, with reference to the
heading: 2. The 8th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 9 of
text_raw:
2. The 8th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 9 of 
the Personal Injuries Resolution Board Act 2022 (No. 42 of 2022), insofar as it 
relates to the insertion of Chapter 1A of the Principal Act, with reference to the 
class of civil action referred to in paragraph (c) of section 3 of that Act, comes 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 1 May 2024 

DARA CALLEARY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [187] 3
